About Me

Fun facts about myself and my interests

Bio

I am a Full Stack Web Development Student with a strong background in Web Application Security and Team Management, educated at the University of California, Los Angeles and currently earning a certificate in Full Stack Development from the University of Utah. Newly honed skills include HTML, CSS, Javascript and backend/database development. Strengths lie in project/people management, creativity, and problem solving. Have developed internal security tools, policies, and training courses. Opened, staffed, trained, and general managed multi-million dollar businesses, and am recently developing several public facing web applications both solo and with a small team. Excited by challenging problems, and passionate about approaching solutions from differing viewpoints. Security and management experience combined with strong technical web development skills position myself well to manage fast-paced and deadline-driven creative development teams.

I have a passion for security, building things, literature, and good ideas.
